title: AFC Competitions Calendar 2022|website=the-afc.com|publisher=Asian Football Confederation|access-date=2022-01-13|archive-date=2022-01-13|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20220113083709/https://assets.the-afc.com/downloads/calendars/AFC-Competitions-Calendar-2022-as-of-Dec-22.pdf|dead-url=yes}}</ref> 一共有 36 支球隊於分組賽角逐，以決出 11 個[[2023–24年亞洲足協盃]][[2023–24年亞洲足協盃淘汰賽|淘汰賽]]席位。

<ref>{{cite web|url=https://www.facebook.com/cpkmacau/posts/pfbid02ixzNTt4xQpWFFfdgRmbjhsRjxDsNtkVvpxyxXm77XF7gGYrpw92gzGUVjNECoZZBl|title=澳科鄒北記亞協盃分組賽第二場比賽，原定5/10(周四)作客南巿台鋼；受颱風「小犬」抵台影響，亞足協宣布賽事延期。|language=zh|trans-title=AFC postponed the second matchday of AFC Cup for Chao Pak Kei, which was originally to be played away against Tainan City Taiwan Steel on 5 October, due to Typhoon Koinu.|work=Facebook|publisher=鄒北記體育會|鄒北記|date=2023年10月4日|access-date=2023年10月26日|archive-date=2023年11月19日|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20231119153907/https://www.facebook.com/cpkmacau/posts/pfbid02ixzNTt4xQpWFFfdgRmbjhsRjxDsNtkVvpxyxXm77XF7gGYrpw92gzGUVjNECoZZBl|dead-url=no}}</ref>
